text:
[Verse]
Morning light shines bright
Coffee cup feels right
Chirping birds take flight
New day new delight

[Verse 2]
Street beats under feet
Neighbors say hello sweet
Mailbox treasure seek
Smiles in every peek

[Chorus]
Everyday magic here
Simple joys so clear
Love and laughter near
No need to fear

[Verse 3]
Sunset paints the sky
Stars begin to sigh
Whisper winds pass by
Dreams that climb high

[Bridge]
In every little thing
Hear the joybells ring
See what life can bring
Feel like a king

[Chorus]
Everyday magic here
Simple joys so clear
Love and laughter near
No need to fear
title: Everyday Magic
